name: Tikka Stick with Rice Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Tikka Stick with Rice Recipe: Chicken ½ kg Salt to taste Lemon juice 2 tbsp Mayonnaise 1 tbsp Garam masala ½ tsp Ginger garlic paste 2 tsp Crushed red chilies 1 tbsp Black pepper ½ tsp Sticks 6 Cream 2 tbsp Oil ½ cup Tomatoes 3 Capsicum 3 For rice: Rice ½ kg Onion 1 Garam masala ½ tsp Salt 1 tsp Black pepper 1 tsp Spring onion ½ kg Oil ½ cup
instructions: First mix chicken with all the ingredients. Now put 1 chicken boti, 1 capsicum, 1 tomato and 1 onion on stick. For rice heat oil, add onion and fry till it gets golden brown. Now add garam masala, ginger garlic paste and salt. Then add 2cup water and all other ingredients then add rice. When it comes on dum add fry onion and serve.
